simulation_API.model.db package¶

Submodules¶

simulation_API.model.db.crud module¶

This program manages database querys. CRUD comes from: Create, Read, Update, and Delete.

simulation_API.model.db.db_manager module¶

This module handles all the database interactions with our API

simulation_API.model.db.models module¶

This program creates all the models and tables in the database

class simulation_API.model.db.models.ParameterDB(**kwargs)¶

Bases: sqlalchemy.ext.declarative.api.Base

class simulation_API.model.db.models.PlotDB(**kwargs)¶

Bases: sqlalchemy.ext.declarative.api.Base

Stores query parameter values of plots needed to access simulation results via GET in route /api/results/{sim_id}/plot?value={plot_query_value}
